vrpRep.structure.instance

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • vrpRep.structure.instance.Request

  • public class Request
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores all request information and attributes.
    Author:
    Maxim HOSKINS, Romain LIENARD, Raphael MOLY and Alexandre RENAUD

      • getAttribute

        public java.util.List<VrpAtt> getAttribute(java.lang.String name)
        Retrieves an attribute from list of attributes.
        By default, the following attribute names are provide :
        • type : id of type of request. Stored in IntValue
        • node : id of linked node. Stored in IntValue
        • link : id of linked link. Stored in IntValue
        • tw : time windows of request. Stored in TimeWindow
        • demand : demands of request : Stored in DemandValue for deterministic demands or for stochastic demands
        • prize : prize of request. Stored in DoubleValue
        • cost : cost of request. Stored in DoubleValue
        • releaseDate : release date of request. Stored in DoubleValue
        • serviceTime : service time of a request. Stored in IntValue for deterministic demands or RequestProbaDist for stochastic demands}
        • predecessor : list of preceeding requets. Stored in IntValue
        • successor : list of succeeding requests. Stored in IntValue
        • skill : list of skills. Stored in SkillAndTool
        • tool: list of tools. Stored in SkillAndTool
        Parameters:
        name - name of attribute
        Returns:
        attribute. null if not found

      • getAtts

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<VrpAtt>> getAtts()
        Returns:
        list of attributes

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Returns:
        the id of request
